email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Breeze, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. Given the current market conditions, the best I can do is $48.50 per metric ton. As for the laycan, we’re looking at October 20-25 for loading. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Regarding the laycan, October 20-25 works for us. Could you also confirm the demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.50 works for you. The demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement for your review shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the demurrage terms are acceptable. Please go ahead and send the charter party agreement. Looking forward to finalizing this deal. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve just sent the charter party agreement to your email. Please review and let me know if you have any questions. Once signed, we’ll proceed with the booking. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
